title: Gooey Toaster

## Installation

Choose your package manager:

**Using npx:**
```bash
npx shadcn@latest add https://gooey-toast.vercel.app/r/gooey-toaster.json
```

**Using pnpm:**
```bash
pnpm dlx shadcn@latest add https://gooey-toast.vercel.app/r/gooey-toaster.json
```

**Using bun:**
```bash
bunx shadcn@latest add https://gooey-toast.vercel.app/r/gooey-toaster.json
```

This will:
- Install the `gooey-ui` and `motion` packages automatically
- Create a wrapper component at `components/ui/gooey-toaster.tsx`
- Import the required styles

## Usage

Add the `<GooeyToaster />` component to your root layout:

```tsx
import { GooeyToaster } from "@/components/ui/gooey-toaster"

export default function RootLayout({ children }) {
  return (
    <html lang="en">
      <body>
        {children}
        <GooeyToaster />
      </body>
    </html>
  )
}
```

Then trigger toasts anywhere in your app:

```tsx
import { gooeyToast } from "@/components/ui/gooey-toaster"

// Basic usage
gooeyToast('Hello World!')

// With variants
gooeyToast.success('Operation successful!')
gooeyToast.error('Something went wrong')
gooeyToast.warning('Please be careful')
gooeyToast.info('Did you know?')

// With description
gooeyToast.success('Saved!', {
  description: 'Your changes have been saved successfully.'
})

// With action button
gooeyToast('File deleted', {
  action: {
    label: 'Undo',
    onClick: () => gooeyToast.success('Undone!')
  }
})

// Promise-based toasts
gooeyToast.promise(fetchData(), {
  loading: 'Loading...',
  success: 'Done!',
  error: 'Failed'
})
```

## Props

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| position | `top-left` \| `top-center` \| `top-right` \| `bottom-left` \| `bottom-center` \| `bottom-right` | `bottom-right` | Toast position on screen |
| duration | `number` | â€” | Default display duration (ms) |
| gap | `number` | `14` | Gap between toasts (px) |
| offset | `number \| string` | `24px` | Distance from screen edge |
| theme | `light` \| `dark` | `light` | Color theme |
| spring | `boolean` | `true` | Enable spring/bounce animations globally |
| bounce | `number` | `0.4` | Spring intensity: 0.05 (subtle) to 0.8 (dramatic) |

See [full documentation](https://gooey-toast.vercel.app) for all options and advanced usage.
